rows.label: qst000506_msg0001
rows.name: Oh my... You must be friends of Riana!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0002
rows.name: So, what can we do for you?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0003
rows.name:
Husband! Husband! It's
terrible! Riana is eloping[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000506_msg0004
rows.name: Eloping...?!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0005
rows.name:
Hmph. Let her. I have no daughter
who would consort with a Superbian!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0006
rows.name:
You might never see
Riana again, you know!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0007
rows.name:
...She's already left, hasn't
she? Then let her be.

rows.label: qst000506_msg0008
rows.name:
Do you really think she'll be
happy if she elopes like this?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0009
rows.name:
Do you not care about your
daughter's happiness?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0010
rows.name: Of course I want her to be happy!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0011
rows.name:
But I will not approve of a
relationship with a Superbian!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0012
rows.name:
You know what the Superbians
did to Gula, don't you?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0013
rows.name:
That was a long, long time ago! It
has nothing to do with them now!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0014
rows.name: Even so, I cannot let it go...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0015
rows.name: You're such a stubborn man.

rows.label: qst000506_msg0016
rows.name:
When Nils went to Superbia to study
medicine, you got angry and threw
him out of the house, didn't you?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0017
rows.name:
And yet you still sent Riana to check
on him. No matter what, you worry
about your children, don't you?

rows.label: qst000506_msg0018
rows.name: Hmph...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0019
rows.name:
No matter what anyone says,
I will not change my mind!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0020
rows.name:
Even if I never see Riana
again, I will have no[ML:Dash ]

rows.label: qst000506_msg0021
rows.name: [ML:Feeling kind=Anger ]regrets!

rows.label: qst000506_msg0022
rows.name: [ML:Feeling ]Honestly, so stubborn...

rows.label: qst000506_msg0023
rows.name:
Well, our conversation is
over. Please leave now.
